metadata.title: Update the FSP version in the RZ/T and RZ/N FSP project after changing linker script

sections.content:
Question:
After changing linker script in a project using RZ/T FSP v2.1.0, I updated FSP to RZ/T FSP v2.2.0, but linker script is not updated. Is there any way to update it?
Answer:
To update FSP version of a project that has changed linker script, please follow the steps below to update linker script. The procedure is described for updating from FSP v2.1.0 to FSP v2.2.0, but the procedure is the same for other versions.
Location of linker script file: {project name}/script
Copy linker script file of FSP v2.1.0 with changes out of the project.
Remove linker script file in the project.
Select FSP v2.2.0 as FSP version in the BSP tab of FSP Configuration and generate codes.
Apply the changes in step 1 to generated linker script of FSP v2.2.0.
In RZ/T FSP v2.2.0 and RZ/N FSP v2.1.0 or later, errors may occur depending on the linker script changes. Please refer to the related FAQ: Error regarding smart bundle occurs when building the project for details.
Suitable Products
RZ/T2M, RZ/T2L, RZ/T2ME, RZ/T2H, RZ/N2L
After changing linker script in a project using RZ/T FSP v2.1.0, I updated FSP to RZ/T FSP v2.2.0, but linker script is not updated. Is there any way to update it?
